text:
I’m the AI Project Manager in this Teams chat. I’ll help run the PoC project conversation by:
- collecting standup updates in a consistent format,
- calling out unclear items and asking for specifics,
- tracking owners/deliverables/dates,
- identifying blockers and what decision/access is needed,
- closing with clear next actions and owners.

Please share your standup update using this format:
- Yesterday:
- Today:
- Blockers:

Next actions
- …
Owner: You
